languages.text: "Шрамы свои получал я не для хвастовства, брат Торбальд".
"I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."
languages.original_text: "Шрамы свои получал я не для хвастовства, брат Торбальд".

traits.locale_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

languages.text: «No me gané estas cicatrices para enseñarlas, hermano Thorbald».
languages.original_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: «No me gané estas cicatrices para enseñarlas, hermano Thorbald».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我的伤疤并不是用来炫耀的，索巴德兄弟。”
languages.original_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: “我的伤疤并不是用来炫耀的，索巴德兄弟。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は傷を見せびらかすために傷を負ったわけではない、ブラザー・トールバルド」
languages.original_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は傷を見せびらかすために傷を負ったわけではない、ブラザー・トールバルド」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas acquis ces cicatrices pour en faire étalage, frère Thorbald. »
languages.original_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas acquis ces cicatrices pour en faire étalage, frère Thorbald. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe meine Narben nicht gesammelt, um damit anzugeben, Bruder Thorbald."
languages.original_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe meine Narben nicht gesammelt, um damit anzugeben, Bruder Thorbald."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yaralarımı, onlarla böbürleneyim diye almadım ben Kardeş Thorbald."
languages.original_text: "I did not acquire my scars to show them off, Brother Thorbald."

traits.locale_text: "Yaralarımı onlarla böbürlenmek için almadım ben Kardeşim Thorbald."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
